# mythicbeasts_pi_operating_systems (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_version = ">= 1.11.0"

  required_providers {
    mythicbeasts = {
      source = "paultibbetts/mythicbeasts"
    }
  }
}

data "mythicbeasts_pi_operating_systems" "four" {
  model = 4
}

output "os_for_model_four" {
  value = data.mythicbeasts_pi_operating_systems.four
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `model` (Number) Filter for Pi Operating Systems with this model number

### Read-Only

- `images` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--images))

<a id="nestedatt--images"></a>
### Nested Schema for `images`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String)
- `name` (String)
